Dev Day 48.summary: Initialized Agent Registry, Folder Mapper, and Reflection Engine. NOVARIS brain begins today.
Dev Day 48.next_steps: Begin Planner Core, Voice Trigger, and Agent Collaboration by Dev Day 50.

Dev Day 50.summary: Voice Agent activated. NOVARIS now speaks from its planner log using offline TTS.
Dev Day 50.next_steps: Enable agent collaboration logic. Connect planner → executor → reflection.

Dev Day 51.summary: Executor Agent created. Agent Collaborator routes planner tasks to executor and logs results to reflection.
Dev Day 51.next_steps: Add trust score, retry mechanism, and fallback logic for executor failures.

Dev Day 52.summary: Enabled trust logic, retry mechanism, and autonomous task execution with planner → executor → reflection loop.
Dev Day 52.next_steps: Allow NOVARIS to generate new agent code from planner descriptions (Dev Day 53+).

Dev Day 53.summary: Autonomous code generation engine created and modules generated.
Dev Day 53.next_steps: Enable code self-validation and syntax checking.

Dev Day 54.summary: Planner and executor tasks executed with trust and retry.

Dev Day 55.summary: Extended code generation across multiple modules autonomously.
Dev Day 55.next_steps: Add code quality and syntax checks.

Dev Day 56.summary:
Autonomous execution with retry & trust:
Create Planner Core Agent → success
Enable Suggestion Engine from reflection logs → success
Prepare Voice Trigger Agent (Dev Day 50) → success
Build agent collaboration logic → success
Dev Day 56.next_steps: Enable task feedback routing + self-regeneration of agent code.
